But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1722>upon<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>day.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Have ye <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> that were <S%G3326>with<s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> in this <S%G5602>place<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> one <S%G3187>greater<s%> than <S%G3588>the<s%> temple. <S%G2411><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye had <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> this <S%G2076>meaneth,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> have <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%> ye would <S%G3756>not<s%> have <S%G2613>condemned<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> guiltless. <S%G338><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he was <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>thence,<s%> he <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> synagogue: <S%G4864><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G3584>withered.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487><s%> Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>days?<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> shall there <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5124>it<s%> <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G999>pit<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day,<s%> will he <S%G3780>not<s%> lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> lift it out? <S%G1453><s%>

How <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is a man better <S%G1308><s%> <S%G444><s%> than a <S%G4263>sheep?<s%> <S%G5620>Wherefore<s%> it is <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath days. <S%G4521><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> and <S%G2983>held<s%> a <S%G4824>council<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> it, he <S%G402>withdrew<s%> himself from <S%G1564>thence:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all;<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2008>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> known: <S%G5318><s%>
That <S%G3704><s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>
